Posts.Content: Just an opinion, but I would.  I would not take any chances that it could come back. Best to you, Beth
Posts.Title: chemo or no chemo?

Posts.Content: Sorry to hear of your illness. I have not gone through it, but my Grandmother did, and  I did work for OB/GYN physicians for 20 years, so I saw alot more than the average person. My gut feeling is that if they want you to "consider" the surgery---GO FOR IT!! Why take the chance?  I always said that is what I would do in that case.  Anything that can be done to assure that there is less of a chance for the cancer to return, I would take. That is only my opinion, and I hope that you are successful, in whatever course of action you take. Beth
Posts.Title: feeling alone

Posts.Content: Linda~ I don't think you saw the last post. Her friend passed nearly 2 weeks ago. Beth
